name: Danganronpa: Despair's Loss [Demo]
description:
A school where despair will reign and 15 students will find themselves in a mutual game of killing. Sayaka Maizono, Leon Kutawa, Chihiro Fujisaki, Mondo Owada, Kiyotaka Ishimaru, Celestia Ludenberg, Yasuhiro Hagakure, Hifumi Yamada, Toko Fukawa, Aoi Asahina, Sakura Ogami, Byakuya Togami, Kyoko Kirigri, Junko Enoshima and Makoto Naegi. Will our familiar characters live to see the outside world? Do they even want to see the outside world? Let's just pray they never have to go  though a deadly defence, a deadly riddle, a deadly....class trial.

{This is a fangame of the popular Danganronpa. All sprites, Backgrounds and Music belong to Spike Chunsoft and the creators of Danganronpa respectively unless stated otherwise in the credits. This takes place in a different universe to Dangan altogether, so the plot is altered and the characters act differently as to how they do in canon.}
